title: How to Make Sweet and Sour Sauce

methods.name: Method One: Traditional Sweet and Sour Sauce

steps.headline: Gather all your ingredients nearby.
steps.description:
This recipe makes 2 cups of sauce and takes 12 minutes to prepare. Here's what you'll need to make traditional sweet and sour sauce:
3/4 cup white sugar
1/3 cup white vinegar
2/3 cup water
1/4 cup soy sauce
1 tablespoon ketchup
2 tablespoons cornstarch

steps.headline: Combine all your ingredients in a small saucepan over medium heat.
Bring the sauce in the saucepan to a boil and stir until thickened.

methods.name: Method Two: Alternative Sweet and Sour Sauce

steps.headline: Gather all your ingredients nearby.
steps.description:
This recipe makes 1.5 cups of sauce and takes 12 minutes to make. Here's what you'll need to make alternate sweet and sour sauce:
1 cup pineapple juice
1/3 cup water
3 tablespoons vinegar
1 tablespoon soy sauce
1/2 cup packed brown sugar
3 tablespoons cornstarch

steps.headline: Combine all your ingredients in a small saucepan over medium heat.
Stirring constantly, bring the sauce to a boil, checking for thickness.
steps.description: Remove from heat once thick and serve.

text:
Method One: Traditional Sweet and Sour Sauce Gather all your ingredients nearby. This recipe makes 2 cups of sauce and takes 12 minutes to prepare. Here's what you'll need to make traditional sweet and sour sauce:
3/4 cup white sugar
1/3 cup white vinegar
2/3 cup water
1/4 cup soy sauce
1 tablespoon ketchup
2 tablespoons cornstarch Combine all your ingredients in a small saucepan over medium heat.  Bring the sauce in the saucepan to a boil and stir until thickened. Remove from heat and serve. Method Two: Alternative Sweet and Sour Sauce Gather all your ingredients nearby. This recipe makes 1.5 cups of sauce and takes 12 minutes to make. Here's what you'll need to make alternate sweet and sour sauce:
1 cup pineapple juice
1/3 cup water
3 tablespoons vinegar
1 tablespoon soy sauce
1/2 cup packed brown sugar
3 tablespoons cornstarch Combine all your ingredients in a small saucepan over medium heat.  Stirring constantly, bring the sauce to a boil, checking for thickness. Remove from heat once thick and serve. Finished.
